song_lyrics: Terī musaknī me man lāgī rahyo re,
Hā re piyā ratipati, ati sakuchit bhayo re... terī 1
Hā re moye uṭhat hai prem so nayo nayo re... terī 2
Jab tum hasat Shyām mohe herat,
Hā re piyā so sukh mukh nahi jāt kahyo re... terī 3
Hā re pulkit Premānand balihārī gayo re... terī 4
title: Terī musaknī me man lāgī rahyo re

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-343: Sadguru Premanand Swami

Category: Murtina Pad
